Description:
Verify that you can save a form's data from the
      popup dialog box and you click yes.

Determine whether Understanding Privacy help content displays
        correctly
Verify that visited links are recorded.

Verify that the master password is visually distinctive from other
        password prompts (indicates the functionality and importance of the
        master password)

Verify that you can remove a username and password for a given site
      and it will no longer autofill on that sight nor will it be listed in
      password manager (netscape.com)
